name: jq-preview
description: A sample JQ for virtual document

jq.customCommand.markdownDescription:
Custom command that supports jq command line options.

 `$$user_filter` is replaced with the filter you typed

 `$$file_path` is replaced with the current file path

jq.strictMode.markdownDescription: By default, this extension only works with files with a `json` file identifier. Turn this off if you want to use it everywhere.

editor/title.when: resourceScheme != jq && !config.jq.strictMode || resourceScheme != jq && resourceLangId == json

commandPalette.when: resourceScheme != jq && !config.jq.strictMode || resourceScheme != jq && resourceLangId == json
